pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION - https://simstrumentation.com
Fire suppression panel for the HJet
NOTES: - Designed for the HJet by Marwan Gharib. Will not work with any other aircraft.
KNOWN ISSUES: - Buttons are currently INOP due to being cotrolled solely by BIO vars / events. This instrument is more for looks than functionality
